title: Add generated static photo asset for Women’s blue floral dress seed item

requirements.summary: Add the generated women’s blue floral dress image to the public generated assets folder so it is served at the expected URL path.
acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at `frontend/public/assets/generated/women_blue_floral_dress.dim_480x640.jpeg`.
Visiting `/assets/generated/women_blue_floral_dress.dim_480x640.jpeg` in the browser returns the image (no 404).
The backend seeded item added in REQ-31 references this image exactly as `photo = "/assets/generated/women_blue_floral_dress.dim_480x640.jpeg"`.

file_operations.description: Add the required static image asset file at this exact path and filename so it can be served directly by the frontend as `/assets/generated/women_blue_floral_dress.dim_480x640.jpeg` (no 404).
